Radiation measurements allow the operation of other smartphone features, such as making and receiving calls, sending and receiving SMS, setting up and using other applications.Take control of the radiation level around you and monitor the dose accumulated in your body using âGamma Sapiensâ and âGS Ecotestâ!The âGS Ecotestâ application provides:- continuous flow of information about the radiation level and the accumulated dose from the âGamma Sapiensâ detector to the smartphone over the Bluetooth interface in real time;- display of collected dosimetric information in one of 4 different graphic representations;- display of collected dosimetric information with GPS coordinates on a map;- setting of one or more dose and dose rate threshold values that, when exceeded, are followed by light, audio, and vibration alarms actuated on the smartphone;- storage of necessary dosimetric information (dose and dose rate) in a relational database;- view of stored dosimetric receiving SMS, setting up and using other applications, etc., without interrupting the process of dosimetric measurement as well as loss of dosimetric data;- work with other well-known âECOTESTâ reviews.title: Need a dosimiter
reviews.comment: This makes sense. But it would be nice if the application listing was a little bit clearer on that
reviews.author: Patrick McCarthy
